```{r cars}
pacman::p_load(dplyr, tidyr, magrittr, lubridate)
housing_data = read.csv("housing_data_2016_2017.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

q_housing = as.data.frame(housing_data)


housing_data
q_housing %<>%
  select(num_bedrooms, num_floors_in_building, kitchen_type, maintenance_cost, num_full_bathrooms, num_total_rooms, sq_footage, total_taxes, walk_score, dining_room_type, fuel_type) %>%
  mutate(kitchen_type = tolower(kitchen_type)) %>%
  mutate(kitchen_type = as.numeric(factor(kitchen_type))) %>%
  mutate(dining_room_type = tolower(dining_room_type)) %>%
  mutate(dining_room_type = as.numeric(factor(dining_room_type))) %>%
  mutate(fuel_type = tolower(fuel_type)) %>%
  mutate(fuel_type = as.numeric(factor(fuel_type))) %>%
  mutate(maintenance_cost = as.numeric(factor(maintenance_cost))) %>%
  mutate(total_taxes = as.numeric(factor(total_taxes)))
  
  


q_housing
```
